H0.text: Ride bikes more is the best way to save animals and trees.

H1.text: Make more farmland is the BEST way to save animals and trees.

H2.text: Take care of forests is the best way to save animals and trees.

H3.text: Move to the city is the best way to save animals and trees.

A4.text: Proforestation is the practice of protecting existing natural forests to foster continuous growth, carbon accumulation, and structural complexity.

A5.text: Old-growth forests have been shown to be more resistant to fires compared to young forests with trees that have thinner bark and with more fuel available for increasing temperatures and fire damage.
